  • Method Details

    • IsCompanyExists

      boolean IsCompanyExists(String email, String password) throws CouponSystemException
      Checks whether a company exists in the DB
      Parameters:
      email - company's email
      password - company's password
      Returns:
      true if company exists, false if company doesn't exist or if the email + password combo are incorrect.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - If we get any SQL exception. Details are provided

    • GetCompanyIDByEmail

      int GetCompanyIDByEmail(String email) throws CouponSystemException
      Returns a company's ID based on email (unique)
      Parameters:
      email - company's email
      Returns:
      companyID if company exists, -1 if company doesn't exist.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - If we get any SQL exception. Details are provided

    • IsCompanyIdExists

      boolean IsCompanyIdExists(int companyID) throws CouponSystemException
      Checks whether a company exists in the DB
      Parameters:
      companyID - company's id
      Returns:
      true if company exists, false if company doesn't exist.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - If we get any SQL exception. Details are provided

    • AddCompany

      boolean AddCompany(Company company) throws CouponSystemException
      Adds a company to the DB - adds the company and the company's coupons (according to the param provided)
      Parameters:
      company - a 'Company' class instance containing company details
      Returns:
      true if succeeded, false if failed.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - If we get any SQL exception. Details are provided

    • DeleteCompany

      boolean DeleteCompany(int companyID) throws CouponSystemException
      Deletes a company (according to the company ID provided)
      Parameters:
      companyID - a company's ID, as listed in the DB
      Returns:
      true if succeeded, false if failed.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - If we get any SQL exception. Details are provided

    • GetAllCompanies

      ArrayList<Company> GetAllCompanies() throws CouponSystemException
      Gets an ArrayList of all the companies listed in the DB
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of 'Company' class items if succeeded, 'null' if failed or if no companies exist.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - If we get any SQL exception. Details are provided

      Gets a company (according to the company ID provided)
      Parameters:

      Returns:
